description: This is an example configuration file with one fake lambot vacuum. You can use this as a template for creating your own configuration file containing lambot vacuum devices you actually own.

accessories.name: [replace with your lambot device name]
accessories.apikey: [replace with your own lambot api key]
accessories.deviceId: [replace with your own lambot device id]
accessories.deviceSn: [replace with your own lambot device sn]
